Azure.ResourceManager.ResourceProvisioni.description: The provisioning state of a resource type.

BindingProperties.description: Defines a component binding for a provider.

role.description: Role that the provider binds to with the component.

ExtendedLocation.description: Extended location is an extension of Azure locations. They provide a way to use their Azure ARC enabled Kubernetes clusters as target locations for deploying Azure services instances.

name.description: The name of the extended location.

type.description: The type of the extended location.
